summary: Phase 3 Items Module Enhancement Testing Complete - All 10 backend tests passed. All frontend UI features verified: Preferences dialog (5 sections), Field Configuration dialog (15 fields with 5 columns), Barcode Scanner dialog, and Save functionality for both dialogs.

issues: React hydration warning: <tr> cannot be child of <span> - cosmetic issue, does not affect functionality (same as Phase 1 & 2)

critical_code_review_comments: React hydration warning in ItemsEnhanced.jsx - <span> wrapper around <tr> elements causing HTML validation issues (same as Phase 1 & 2)
seed_data_creation: None - used existing preferences and field config
context_for_next_testing_agent: Items Module Phase 3 complete. All new features tested: Preferences dialog with SKU/HSN-SAC/Alerts/Defaults/Features sections, Field Configuration dialog with 15 fields and Active/List/Form/PDF/Required columns, Auto SKU generation endpoint, Barcode Scanner dialog with camera integration. Frontend route is /inventory-management with More menu containing Preferences, Field Configuration, and Scan Barcode options.

get_preferences.notes: Returns all module preferences with 20+ settings

update_preferences.notes: Updates preferences and persists to database

get_field_config.notes: Returns 15 field configurations with visibility settings

get_fields_for_role.notes: Returns fields filtered by role with list/form/pdf separation

generate_sku_disabled.notes: Returns disabled message when auto_generate_sku is false

generate_sku_enabled.notes: Generates SKU with custom prefix when enabled

frontend_preferences_dialog.notes: Opens from More menu, has 5 sections: SKU Settings, HSN/SAC Settings, Alerts & Notifications, Default Values, Features

frontend_field_config_dialog.notes: Opens from More menu, shows 15 fields with Active/List/Form/PDF/Required columns

frontend_scanner_dialog.notes: Opens from More menu, has Start Camera button (camera requires browser permissions)

frontend_save_preferences.notes: Save Preferences button works, shows 'Preferences saved' toast

frontend_save_field_config.notes: Save Configuration button works, shows 'Field configuration saved' toast

phase1_phase2_regression.notes: All Phase 1 & 2 features (items list, price lists, groups, warehouses, reports) still working
